info.sourceTextContent: Por mi amor de esposa, por el amor que tengo a nuestro hijo, quisiera oponerme a tu empresa y retenerte a mi lado; pero el amor de tu gloria, que reflejará en mí y en tu hijo, me mueve a no impedir tu partida, aunque el impedirla estuviera a mi alcance.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Because of the love my wife has for me, and the love I have for our son, I would oppose you and keep you by my side, but because of your fame, which would cast a shadow on me, and on your son, I will not stop you, though it is in my power to do it
